heisig_chinese_memo: The farmer is in a hard time with his pigeon coop farming so he decides to start brewing whiskey in his pigeon coop and makes more money that way.

niàng: (графема) вино
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The new brew that everyone loves is Angel Light beer.  It comes with a picture of a halo on the front of the bottle.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " unitary ", " Xiang " sound. The original meaning is wine. "Said Wen": "Bringing, brewing. Making wine is brewing. From you to Xiangsheng." "Jade chapter. "Youbu": "Making, making wine." Such as "Historical Records. The Biography of Meng Changjun: "A lot of wine, buy fat cattle, call all those who can take money, those who can take interest will come, and those who cannot take interest will also come, all hold the coupon book for taking money together." Records. "Mother Lu": "Mother Lu's family is rich in wealth, rich in assets, and is a good brewing wine." Later it refers to brewing. For example, in the Northern Song Dynasty, Ouyang Xiu "Shang Chun": "The bee urges the honey to make the flowers and the flowers are exhausted.

" Stuffed " by extension means wine. Such as "Shi Shuo Xin Yu. "Appreciation": "Liu Yinyun: "Seeing He Cidao drinking makes people want to drink home brews."" Mei Yaochen of the Northern Song Dynasty "Xuanzhou Huanbo Pavilion": "The heart is idle and not competing, and Xingshi is always brewing."

" Stuffed " means mixed, mixed. Such as "Book of Rites. "Nei Ze": "Quilt, chicken, glutinous, stuffed Polygonum." Zheng Xuan's note: "Stuffing is nothing but miscellaneous." It also refers to adulteration. Such as "New Tang Book. "Lv Xiang Chuan": "Try to use Li Shan's Annotation of Wen Xuan as a propaganda, and it will be more exaggerated with Lu Yanji, Liu Liang, Zhang Xian, Li Zhouhan, etc., and the time and name of the five ministers."

" Stuffed " means gradually formed. Such as "Lun Heng. "Fruit": "Goodness transforms woes, and its teachings are changed into goodness, and goodness is more appropriate than to be good." "Song History. "The Story of Wu Lin": "Suppressing the Third World as a general leads to the change of Nixi, covering his ancestry and covering it with You Yan."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " unitary ", " Xiang " sound. The original meaning is wine, and the extension means wine.
humanum_full_description:
從「酉」，「襄」聲。本義是釀酒。《說文》：「釀，醞也。作酒曰釀。从酉，襄聲。」《玉篇．酉部》：「釀，作酒也。」如《史記．孟嘗君列傳》：「迺多釀酒，買肥牛，召諸取錢者，能與息者皆來，不能與息者亦來，皆持取錢之券書合之。」《東觀漢記．載記．呂母》：「呂母家素富，豐資產，乃益釀醇酒。」後泛指釀造。如北宋歐陽修〈傷春〉：「蜂催釀蜜愁花盡，絮撲暄條妒雪飛。」

　　「釀」引申表示酒。如《世說新語．賞譽》：「劉尹云：『見何次道飲酒，使人欲傾家釀。』」北宋梅堯臣〈宣州環波亭〉：「心閑不競物，興適每傾釀。」

　　「釀」表示雜拌、雜和。如《禮記．內則》：「鶉羮、雞羮、鴽，釀之蓼。」鄭玄注：「釀謂切雜之也。」又指摻雜。如《新唐書．呂向傳》：「嘗以李善釋《文選》為繁釀，與呂延濟、劉良、張銑、李周翰等更為詁解，時號五臣注。」

　　「釀」表示逐漸形成。如《論衡．率性》：「善以化渥，釀其教令，變更為善，善則且更宜反過於往善。」《宋史．吳璘傳》：「抑三世為將，釀成逆曦之變，覆其宗祀，蓋有由焉。」
humanum_short_description: 從「酉」，「襄」聲。本義是釀酒，引申表示酒。

從「 酉 」，「 襄 」聲。本義是釀酒。《說文》：「釀，醞也。作酒曰釀。从酉，襄聲。」《玉篇．酉部》：「釀，作酒也。」如《史記．孟嘗君列傳》：「迺多釀酒，買肥牛，召諸取錢者，能與息者皆來，不能與息者亦來，皆持取錢之券書合之。」《東觀漢記．載記．呂母》：「呂母家素富，豐資產，乃益釀醇酒。」後泛指釀造。如北宋歐陽修〈傷春〉：「蜂催釀蜜愁花盡，絮撲暄條妒雪飛。」 「 釀 」引申表示酒。如《世說新語．賞譽》：「劉尹云：『見何次道飲酒，使人欲傾家釀。』」北宋梅堯臣〈宣州環波亭〉：「心閑不競物，興適每傾釀。」 「 釀 」表示雜拌、雜和。如《禮記．內則》：「鶉羮、雞羮、鴽，釀之蓼。」鄭玄注：「釀謂切雜之也。」又指摻雜。如《新唐書．呂向傳》：「嘗以李善釋《文選》為繁釀，與呂延濟、劉良、張銑、李周翰等更為詁解，時號五臣注。」 「 釀 」表示逐漸形成。如《論衡．率性》：「善以化渥，釀其教令，變更為善，善則且更宜反過於往善。」《宋史．吳璘傳》：「抑三世為將，釀成逆曦之變，覆其宗祀，蓋有由焉。」

The Biography of Meng Changjun: "A lot of wine, buy fat cattle, call all those who can take money, those who can take interest will come, and those who cannot take interest will also come, all hold the coupon book for taking money together." Records. "Mother Lu": "Mother Lu's family is rich in wealth, rich in assets, and is a good brewing wine." Later it refers to brewing. For example, in the Northern Song Dynasty, Ouyang Xiu "Shang Chun": "The bee urges the honey to make the flowers and the flowers are exhausted. " Stuffed" by extension means wine. 釀字的基本解释

釀
niàng

釀
niáng
均见“酿”。

釀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niàng］
［《廣韻》女亮切，去漾，娘。］
“酿1”的繁体字。亦作“醸1”。
(1)酿造。原专指酿酒，后亦指利用发酵作用酿造蜜、醋、酱等。
(2)酒。
(3)切割拌和；糅合。
(4)指搀杂，杂凑。
(5)逐渐形成；造成。

釀字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　釀； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1289第23
【唐韻】【集韻】女亮切【韻會】汝亮切【正韻】魚向切，?音?。【說文】醞也。作酒曰釀。【廣韻】醞酒也。【史記·孟嘗君傳】乃多釀酒買肥牛。【貨殖傳】通邑大都酤一歲千釀。【前漢·食貨志】一釀用麤米二斛，麴一斛，得成酒六斛六斗。　又【增韻】後人因謂酒爲釀。【世說新語】劉惔曰：見何次道飮，令人欲傾家釀。　又【禮·內則】鶉羹、雞羹、鴽，釀之蓼。【註】釀謂切雜之也。

釀字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
釀字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niàng］
["Guangyun" female bright cut, go to Yang, mother. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "飲1". Also known as "醸1".
(1) Brewing. Originally refers exclusively to winemaking, but later also refers to the use of fermentation to brew honey, vinegar, sauce, etc.
(2) Wine.
(3) Cutting and mixing; mixing.
(4) Refers to mixed and mixed.
(5) Gradually formed; caused.
wine
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　 Niang; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 1289 Page 23
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Female bright cut [Yun Hui] Ru Liang cut [Zheng Yun] Fish to cut, "yin". [Said the text] also brewing. Make wine called brewing. [Guang Yun] Brewing wine. 【Historical Records·Mengchang Jun】It is more to make wine to buy fat beef. [Goods Reproduction] Tongyi is mostly one-year-old wine. [Previous Han·Shihuo Zhi] One brewing with coarse rice and two hu, and koji one hu, you get six hu and six buckets of wine.　[Zeng Yun] Later generations said that wine was brewed. [Shi Shuo Xin Yu] Liu Xun said: See He Ci Dao Shou, it makes people want to drink home brew.　[Li·Nei Ze] quail soup, chicken soup, glutinous rice, stuffed polygonum. [Note] Stuffing is a mixed bag.
